array.name: Notification
array.cmd:
ahk #Persistent
#SingleInstance, Force 
; Your controls
Gui, Font, s10 Bold
Gui, Add, Text, center w2048, Text 1
Gui, Add, Text, center w2048, Text 2 
; Removes the Border and Task bar icon
Gui, +ToolWindow -Caption
; can be any colour but it's good to use a color that is NOT present in ur GUI
;Gui, Color, EEAA99 
Gui, Show, W2048 H100 X0 Y0, Test 
WinSet, TransColor, EEAA99 150, Test
Sleep 3000
Gui, Cancel
Return
